Class TriggerRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • TriggerRequest

  • public class TriggerRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure used for storing trigger requests from peripherals on the request queue.
    Author:
    Shawn Koop

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String[] arguments
      An array of String objects that represent arguments of the trigger.
      Peripheral peripheral
      The Peripheral on which the trigger occurred.
      java.lang.String triggerName
      A String representing the trigger that occurred.
      boolean value
      The boolean value of the trigger.

      • TriggerRequest

        public TriggerRequest(boolean value,
              Peripheral peripheral,
              java.lang.String triggerName,
              java.lang.String... arguments)
        Creates a TriggerRequest object.
        Parameters:
        value - The boolean value of the trigger.
        peripheral - The Peripheral object making the trigger request.
        triggerName - The String representation of the trigger that has occurred.
        arguments - String objects that represent arguments of the trigger that has occurred.
